title: Plan to suit your project needs
description: Cool and cross browser web apps. Shiny and efficient Android and IOS apps. Elegant and minimal wearable apps. Build and operate your IT solutions in an agile and simple way. Lets bring your projects to life, our team will help you develop or improve your product in the most effective way.

offers.name: MOCK UP
offers.question: Do you want to show your idea?
offers.description: Graphic representation of the initial idea that does not include dynamic content.
offers.descriptionCont: The best possible model of your product, to provide at least part of the functionality of a system and enable testing on users. We are much more than a software company, and we care about your users. They will be the ones that will make your idea a hit! Mock-ups are a very important part in the process of designing a digital product, to make it the most profitable and efficient as possible.

offers.name: PROTOTYPE
offers.question: Do you want to give a try to your idea?
offers.description: Basic and fundamental behavior of the project
offers.descriptionCont: , excluding generation of dynamic content and server-side/cloud storage. The basic and most efficient model of the system that would give life to your product. The first step into developing a digital service, that allows the firsts iterations to build the more stable version possible. Prototyping has several benefits, as the developers and designers can get valuable feedback from the users and yourself!

offers.name: MVP
offers.question: Or do you want you project to hit the market and get investors?
offers.description: Minimum product that allows to represent in a clear and fluid form, the product or service that you offer.
offers.descriptionCont: Our team love to build top-notch products, relying on science and technology, continuously improving the technology content of products delivererd, for customers and companies to create a higher market value.

boxing.title: Boxing offers
boxing.description: Perhaps you already know what you are looking for your project.
boxing.claim: Pick one and reach the top!

trust.title: They trust us
trust.quote: Acá va a ir alguna cita respecto a la experiencia de trabajo de algún cliente
